channel.title: Comments on: Recommended Reading: Simon Willison

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/03/29/recommended-reading-simon-willison/#comment-3349">Simon Willison</a>.
Ah, that's where they are hiding!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Simon Willison.

Ah, that’s where they are hiding!

item.title: By: Simon Willison
item.dc:creator: Simon Willison
item.description: Thanks for the compliment! I have a few feeds that aren't very well publicised, including one just of links: http://simonwillison.net/feeds/
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the compliment! I have a few feeds that aren’t very well publicised, including one just of links: http://simonwillison.net/feeds/

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/03/29/recommended-reading-simon-willison/#comment-3347">Lloyd Budd</a>.
When I writing this I looked around his site for a feed URL that was just his links, but I couldn't find one either.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lloyd Budd.

When I writing this I looked around his site for a feed URL that was just his links, but I couldn’t find one either.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description:
As do I!
I do wish there was a feed just for his links, because I get two copies of his own articles -- such a small price to pay.
item.content:encoded:
As do I!

I do wish there was a feed just for his links, because I get two copies of his own articles — such a small price to pay.
